Bloomington.Bloomington High School South:
Bloomington High School South (sometimes BHSS or simply South) is a high school in Bloomington, Indiana.


== Academics ==
The school currently uses a schedule consisting of three 12-week trimesters. Each class period is 65 minutes, with a 45-minute SRT period on Mondays, 45-minute Panther Plus Periods on Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, and Friday.
